tableName: Allocation of Criteria to Search Structure
contents: Allocation of criteria to combinations of search tree nodes and generica articles within the TecDoc search structure

attr.name: nodeId
attr.description: Unambiguous number of the search node(->301)

attr.name: genArtNr
attr.description: Unambiguous number of the generic article(->320)

attr.name: sortNr
attr.description: sorting order within a search node

attr.name: kritNr
attr.description: Unambiguous number of the criterion (DT ->50),must be of type 'k'
